Package gui

Class TravelerFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.TravelerFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TravelerFrameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controls the behavior of the traveler frame, allowing the traveler to navigate through different functionalities. This includes viewing profile, ordering visits, viewing orders, managing waiting lists, checking messages, and logging out.

      public TravelerFrameController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the traveler frame controller, setting up the initial state of the traveler frame and loading the traveler's profile immediately upon initialization. This method also checks for any pending notifications or messages for the traveler.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The URL location of the FXML file.
      resources - The ResourceBundle for the FXML file.

    • travelerProfile

      public void travelerProfile(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Navigates to the traveler's profile page when the corresponding button is clicked. This method updates the main content pane of the traveler frame with the traveler's profile information.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the traveler profile button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the profile page.

    • orderBtn

      public void orderBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Navigates to the order visit page when the corresponding button is clicked. This method updates the main content pane of the traveler frame with the order visit form.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the order visit button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the order visit page.

    • viewOrdersbutton

      public void viewOrdersbutton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Navigates to the traveler's orders page when the corresponding button is clicked. This method updates the main content pane of the traveler frame with the list of traveler's orders.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the view orders button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the traveler's orders page.

    • waitingListBtn

      public void waitingListBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Navigates to the traveler's waiting lists page when the corresponding button is clicked. This method updates the main content pane of the traveler frame with the list of traveler's waiting lists.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the waiting list button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the traveler's waiting lists page.

    • logoutBtn

      public void logoutBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Logs out the traveler from the application and navigates back to the main menu. This method sends a logout request to the server, clears the current traveler's session, and redirects to the homepage.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the logout button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while logging out the traveler.

    • exit

      public void exit(javafx.event.ActionEvent click) throws Exception
      Handles the action of traveler logout. This method logs out the traveler with navigating to the home page.
      Parameters:
      click - The ActionEvent triggered by clicking the exit button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the exit process.
